title: 3T’s New Extrema Italia is a Race-Ready Gravel or Bikepacking Rig
content:
3T pioneered aero frames off road, but this latest model goes bikepacking with dedicated mounts and even bigger tire clearance, without moving away from their aero origins.

Read the full article at 3T’s New Extrema Italia is a Race-Ready Gravel or Bikepacking Rig on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
